name: Yeemik

personality.mannerisms: Sneering, always watching for openings, quick to betray

role: Second-in-command at Cragmaw Hideout. Wants Klarg's job.
deal: Offers to release Sildar if party kills Klarg and brings back his head. Lies - will demand ransom even after.
tactics: If party refuses deal, shoves Sildar off ledge (1d6 damage, drops to 0 HP). Then fights.
treasure: Pouch: 3 gold teeth (1 gp each), 15 sp
